CustomField.formula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Payment_Method__c,'Payment'),OR ( ISPICKVAL(Reference_Notes__c, 'Loan Payout'),ISPICKVAL(Reference_Notes__c, 'Partial Payment'), ISPICKVAL(Reference_Notes__c, 'Payment Surplus'), ISPICKVAL(Reference_Notes__c, 'Bad Debt Recovery'), ISPICKVAL(Reference_Notes__c, 'Client Rebate')))
CustomField.label: Include in Payments Sum
